item.title: How can i make an object give me Str Xp?
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("LOLZ you aint gona find anything in there"); addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[18]), 18); stillgfx(247, absY, absX); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x320); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }

Putt that under case 299: here is how to make this work for you.

if(actionTimer == 0)

change the 0 to any number for example 3 would be every 3 seconds this stops massers.

sendMessage("LOLZ you aint gona find anything in there"); addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[18]), 18);
sendMessage is obvious for addSkillXP for the [skill id], skill id); change those numbers to your skill ID

stillgfx(247, absY, absX); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x320); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
This is just your gfx keep it there and don’t change it.

if you still need help pm me.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make an object give me Str Xp?
item.dc:creator: @Vladie Vladie
item.description:
@Vladie wrote:

Example.

case (object id): if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("Message here"); setAnimation(881); addSkillXP(150, 16); actionTimer = 5; } break;
As in this example it is giving 150 exp to thieving. Add this into your cases and modify it and it will work.
Now did I help?
